@StinkStopthe the residents from Newcastle Under Lyme are suffering daily as a result of obnoxious gas odours pouring into the atmosphere from Whalley‚Äôs Quarry & into their homes & schools. We need your immediate help and a full enquiry to discover why @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency

The residents of #NewcastleunderLyme are suffering from the noxious gases & leachate oozing from #Walleys Landfill. Please help us @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL to 
@StinkStopthe 
#StoptheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 This is not going away #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/Pt9Jfh7owP
